What are the treatments for Barth syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of Barth syndrome:  - Cleveland Clinic: Dilated Cardiomyopathy  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Barth Syndrome  - Genetic Testing Registry: 3-Methylglutaconic aciduria type 2  - Johns Hopkins Chil
